mapper.sql: t.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID, t.MCHNT_CONTRACT_ID, t.CONTRACT_TYPE, t.PRODUCT_CODE, t.CONTRACT_RATE, t.DATA_STAT, t.CONTRACT_START_DATE, t.CONTRACT_END_DATE, t.REMARKS, t.CREATE_USER, t.UPDATE_USER, t.CREATE_TIME, t.UPDATE_TIME, t.LOCK_VERSION
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM TB_MERCHANT_CONTRACT_LIST t WHERE t.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID=#{contractDetailId}

FROM TB_MERCHANT_CONTRACT_LIST t WHERE t.MCHNT_CONTRACT_ID=#{mchntContractId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MERCHANT_CONTRACT_LIST ( CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID, MCHNT_CONTRACT_ID, CONTRACT_TYPE, PRODUCT_CODE, CONTRACT_RATE, DATA_STAT, CONTRACT_START_DATE, CONTRACT_END_DATE, REMARKS, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, LOCK_VERSION ) VALUES ( #{contractDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntContractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, sysdate, '0')
